excerpt: Amazon is offering a really great deal on the latest generation AirPods 4 for 22% off, Apple Watch Series 10 for 18% off, and a pack of AirTags for 29% off… why pay more than you have to for …
text: Amazon is offering a really great deal on the latest generation AirPods 4 for 22% off, Apple Watch Series 10 for 18% off, and a pack of AirTags for 29% off… why pay more than you have to for the same Apple gear you want? Check out these deals while they’re available! AirPods 4 – $99 (down from $129) Amazon is offering the newest generation AirPods 4 for just $99, taking the price down 22% off retail of $129. This is an all-time low price for the latest AirPods and they’re popular Bluetooth headphones for a reason, with sweat and water resistance, USB-C charging, long battery life, personalized Spatial Audio, voice isolation, Siri commands, head gesture support, automatic ear detection, and more. Get AirPods 4 for $99 (down 22% from $129) Apple Watch Series 10 – $329 (down from $399) Apple Watch Series 10 offers advanced features like an always-on display, fitness and activity tracking, a heart rate monitor, ECG functionality, crash and fall detection, Emergency SOS, ovulation tracking, GPS, pinch gesture support, voice control, all-day battery life, and water resistance—all at a $70 discount! Get it for $329 (down from $399) on Amazon, available in a variety of colors and bands. Don’t miss out! Get Apple Watch Series 9 for $329 (down from $399 MSRP) AirTags 4-pack – $70 (down from $99) AirTag personal trackers let you easily keep track of your belongings, whether it’s a briefcase, backpack, luggage, pet, bike, car, or more. The 4-pack usually costs $99, but right now, you can get it for $69.99 on Amazon! AirTags – 4-pack – $69.99 (down from $99) FTC: OSXDaily is an affiliate partner with Amazon, meaning if you click a link and make a purchase, we may receive a small payment which goes towards keeping the site running.
html:
Amazon is offering a really great deal on the latest generation AirPods 4 for 22% off, Apple Watch Series 10 for 18% off, and a pack of AirTags for 29% off… why pay more than you have to for the same Apple gear you want? Check out these deals while they’re available!

AirPods 4 – $99 (down from $129)

Amazon is offering the newest generation AirPods 4 for just $99, taking the price down 22% off retail of $129. This is an all-time low price for the latest AirPods and they’re popular Bluetooth headphones for a reason, with sweat and water resistance, USB-C charging, long battery life, personalized Spatial Audio, voice isolation, Siri commands, head gesture support, automatic ear detection, and more.

  • Get AirPods 4 for $99 (down 22% from $129)

Apple Watch Series 10 – $329 (down from $399)

Apple Watch Series 10 offers advanced features like an always-on display, fitness and activity tracking, a heart rate monitor, ECG functionality, crash and fall detection, Emergency SOS, ovulation tracking, GPS, pinch gesture support, voice control, all-day battery life, and water resistance—all at a $70 discount! Get it for $329 (down from $399) on Amazon, available in a variety of colors and bands. Don’t miss out!

  • Get Apple Watch Series 9 for $329 (down from $399 MSRP)

AirTags 4-pack – $70 (down from $99)

AirTag personal trackers let you easily keep track of your belongings, whether it’s a briefcase, backpack, luggage, pet, bike, car, or more. The 4-pack usually costs $99, but right now, you can get it for $69.99 on Amazon!

  • AirTags – 4-pack – $69.99 (down from $99)
